Question
========

A student performs a repeated measures ANOVA on a data set with two time points (pre-test and post-test).

Which analysis could she have done equally well? 
Answerlist
----------
* A two-way ANOVA ('two-way ANOVA').
* An *t* test for two independent groups ('independent samples *t* test').
* A paired *t* test ('paired samples *t* test').
* A chi-square test for independence.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
